named-query.name: TidbitKindForName
named-query.query: SELECT k FROM TidbitKind k WHERE LOWER(k.name) = LOWER(:name)

named-query.name: TidbitKindsForName
named-query.query: SELECT k FROM TidbitKind k WHERE LOWER(k.name) LIKE :name
